description:
B.MPI3 is a C++ library wrapper for standard MPI-3. B.MPI3 is designed following the principles of Boost
and the STL. B.MPI3 is unrelated to the official, now deprecated, MPI-C++ interface. It provides an iterator-based interface and MPI-3 features (RMA and Shared memory). B.MPI3 is written from scratch in C++14.
name: B.MPI3
